titles.title: Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects majority Members to the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, including the Chairman.
